UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity analysis of buforin II, a histone H2A-derived antimicrobial peptide: the proline hinge is responsible for the cell-penetrating ability of buforin II.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2000;97:8245-8250
Literature.Author: Park CB, Yi KS, Matsuzaki K, Kim MS, Park CB, Yi KS, Matsuzaki K, Kim MS, Kim SC, Kim SC

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and protease stability of peptides containing fluorinated amino acids
Literature.Author: Meng H, Kumar K
